Widget animation
================

.. |pic1| image:: /images/examples/animation__animate__py.png
   :width: 50%
   :align: middle

|pic1|

This example demonstrates creating and applying a multi-part animation to a
button widget. You should see a button labelled 'plop' that will move with an
animation when clicked.
